code.title: HCI NSU
code.description: A collection of tutorial files and code samples created during my studies at HCI NSU, with brief information about each task and the date it was created.

code.title: Hearts of Stone and Steel
code.description: Showcase demo of a detective game in Python/Pygame, featuring dialogues, interaction, camera system, dynamic movement, scene manager, and sound.

code.title: Egg Hunt
code.description: A 2D platformer created using Python and Pygame. Play as a boy in a chicken costume, collect eggs, and complete levels

code.title: Pong Pygame
code.description: Pong in Python using Pygame - a simple and fun implementation of the classic arcade game for two players. This project is a great way to learn the basics of game development, graphics handling, and event processing in Python.

code.title: Personal Website
code.description: Personal website and blog hosted with GitHub Pages. Showcases my projects, articles, notes, and portfolio. Built with modern web technologies to provide a convenient and attractive online presence.

code.title: Mortgage Calculator
code.description: A web application designed to help users estimate monthly mortgage payments. Built with Vue.js, it provides real-time calculations for loan amounts, interest rates, and terms.

code.title: Knight Move
code.description: A minimalistic logic game inspired by the classic chess knight movement. Built with Vue.js, the game challenges players to plan moves strategically while following traditional chess rules.
